DATA PROCESSOR INVITATION

Receive, track, and solve subject access requests — all in one place

We help agile online companies achieve full compliance with global data privacy laws and scale their privacy operations.

A client invited you to join as their Data Processor so you can harness powerful automations to solve data access requests across all your systems in one place — efficiently, every time.

(No credit card required)

Full compliance, without the busywork

Central Dashboard

Use a central dashboard to get a look inside your entire privacy compliance posture, including data subject requests across all your systems, timelines, third-party processing, and more.

Easy Integrations

Automate your DSAR delivery by syncing privacy data across the tools and systems you already know and love. Integrate LegalSite into sales, marketing, support, HR, and other critical workflows.

DSAR Logs

Demonstrates compliance by tracking consent, DSARs, and every action in the process. View and export detailed consent logs and reports for internal and external review or benchmarking.

Solve data subject requests with ease

Centralize and take control of all incoming requests from data subjects and controllers, and track important deadlines. Tasks are automatically generated and sent for processing, saving your team thousands of hours of busywork, preventing delays and fines, and providing great user experiences.

Get Started

Integrate LegalSite into your workflows

Get relevant data subject information across all your systems — whether it’s your preferred CRM, marketing, or customer service platform. Easily sync data using our extensive library of integrations and automate tasks for enhanced productivity.

See Integrations

Put security at the forefront

Secure system processes are built into the LegalSite DNA, so protecting your data is always our top priority. With end-to-end encryption, SSO, SSAE-16 SOC II compliant data centers, firewalls, secure email, and proactive 24/7 system monitoring, you can rest assured your data is always safe.

Get Started

A better way to manage privacy
operations — and it’s free to try!

Automate your access requests for up to 1,000 data subjects at absolutely no cost. As your needs grow, you can add as many data subjects as you need, whenever you need them.
